attributes.iconName: =if(@currentField == 'None' || @currentField == '','FavoriteStar','') + if(@currentField == 'Yellow Star','FavoriteStarFill','') + if(@currentField == 'Orange Star','FavoriteStarFill','') + if(@currentField == 'Red Star','FavoriteStarFill','') + if(@currentField == 'Purple Star','FavoriteStarFill','') + if(@currentField == 'Blue Star','FavoriteStarFill','') + if(@currentField == 'Green Star','FavoriteStarFill','') + if(@currentField == 'Alert','AlertSolid','') + if(@currentField == 'Arrow','MSNVideosSolid','') + if(@currentField == 'Checkmark','CompletedSolid','') + if(@currentField == 'Info','InfoSolid','') + if(@currentField == 'Question','UnknownSolid','')
attributes.title: @currentField

style.color: =if(@currentField == 'None' || @currentField == '','#DDD','') + if(@currentField == 'Yellow Star','#f6c94b','') + if(@currentField == 'Orange Star','#f7a24b','') + if(@currentField == 'Red Star','#e57b72','') + if(@currentField == 'Purple Star','#b866c7','') + if(@currentField == 'Blue Star','#79a8f6','') + if(@currentField == 'Green Star','#56b989','') + if(@currentField == 'Alert','#e57b72','') + if(@currentField == 'Arrow','#f7a24b','') + if(@currentField == 'Checkmark','#56b989','') + if(@currentField == 'Info','#79a8f6','') + if(@currentField == 'Question','#b866c7','')
